com.codename1.ui.layouts

Class GridBagLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.ui.layouts.Layout
      • com.codename1.ui.layouts.GridBagLayout

  • public class GridBagLayout
extends Layout

    Codename One port of the infamous GridBagLayout based on the Apache Harmony code. For new applications we generally recommend a "native" Codename One layout such as TableLayout and recommend avoiding this layout. Its here for developers who are accustomed to it and need to port existing code.
